TopicTitle: Add a button or a menu for Autoload

Articles.Content:
Since now i have to ALT+F4 to load a messed up flight when i forgot to Quicksave. Could you add a button in menu (ESC) where we can look at recent or last auto-saves and/or a Button like F10 to load last autosave.

Really anoying having to quit the whole game just to fix a broken stage.
